item.description:
On Tuesday, April 16, at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “The Moral Autonomy and Epistemic Distance Disproofs of God,” an open and critical discussion, based in part on James Rachels, “God and Moral Autonomy,” www.infidels.org/library/modern/james_rachels/autonomy.html. Location: Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston.

This event is free & open to all: info@disproofatheism.org.
item.name: Critical Discussion: The Moral Autonomy and Epistemic Distance Disproofs of God
